review: Works very well, just as advertized.  A good value.
author: Figgie

review: The Fire Stick is great! We can finally get Netflix and many other programs on our living room tv.
author: Stacy Mellinger

review: The Fire Stick is so easy to connect and works just as described! I am an Amazon Prime subscriber, so it opens up a lot of movies for us. A good buy!
author: cindy hightower

review: I think it works great for what we were needing. Fixing to buy a couple more and cut the cable service. I can access everything we need on the main screen. The only downside is it has to be plugged into tv and electricity which is more wires.
author: Dee Onna Herrera

review: Works great ,wish I could  add more apps.

review: Verygood, hope it will continue to do well .

review: Awesome totally love it....gonna buy one for my mom
